attributes.additional_details:
End the TV Licence.

Not everyone that can get any BBC service is forced to buy a licence...unless this is made equal then it is not right to charge/force anybody by law to buy a licence for a product they may not want.

Those that should also be charged.

Everyone with the following.
                                       Internet able Phone.
                                       Internet,
Also all those that can get any BBC service anywhere in the world starting with the EU.

No company should have the law on there side so that they can force a charge for any product on anyone. if they do then it should be regulated to be fair and only those that have a fee can have the product.
